main.Query:
Declare @vchSQL varchar(max) Declare @bigsql varchar(max)
set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + '] IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[usp_PopulateUIAggregationData]'') AND type in (N''P'', N''PC'')) DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_PopulateUIAggregationData] ' exec (@vchSQL)
set @vchSQL =' Create PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_PopulateUIAggregationData]
@DimPoolId bigint, @ResultLTVPassNo varchar(50)
AS
declare @TotalLoanCount bigint declare @ConsolidationSoldLoanCount bigint declare @SoldLoanBalance decimal(19,4) declare @TotalBalance decimal(19,4) declare @Seasoning decimal(15,2) declare @ConsolidationLTV decimal(15,4) declare @InvestmentPropertyFlag decimal(15,4) declare @ScurbbedFlag decimal(15,4) declare @PaymentTypeCode decimal(15,4) declare @TotalSecurityCount bigint declare @TotalValuation decimal(24,6)
Update Statistics dbo.tblFactLoan Update Statistics dbo.tblFactSecurity Update Statistics dbo.tblFactLoanSecurity Update Statistics dbo.tblDimLoan Update Statistics dbo.tblDimSecurity
Select @TotalSecurityCount = COUNT(Distinct FCS.DimSecurityId) From dbo.tblFactConsolidationSecurity FCS Where FCS.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId And FCS.LTVPassNo = @ResultLTVPassNo
Select @TotalValuation = SUM(ISNULL(FC.ConsolidationValuation,0)) From dbo.tblFactConsolidation FC Where FC.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId And FC.LTVPassNo = @ResultLTVPassNo
Select @TotalLoanCount = COUNT(Distinct FL.DimLoanID) From dbo.tblFactLoan FL Join dbo.tblFactConsolidationLoan FCL on FCL.DimPoolID = FL.DimPoolID And FCL.DimLoanId = FL.DimLoanID Where FCL.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId And FCL.LTVPassNo = @ResultLTVPassNo
Select @ConsolidationSoldLoanCount = COUNT(Distinct FCL.DimLoanID) From dbo.tblFactConsolidation FC Join dbo.tblFactConsolidationLoan FCL on FCL.DimPoolID = FC.DimPoolID And FCL.DimConsolidationID = FC.DimConsolidationID And FCL.LTVPassNo = FC.LTVPassNo Where FC.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId And FC.ConsolidationDimTrustID > 0 And FC.LTVPassNo = @ResultLTVPassNo
Select @SoldLoanBalance = SUM(CurrentPrincipalBalance) From dbo.tblFactLoan Where DimPoolID = @DimPoolId And DimLoanID in ( Select Distinct FCL.DimLoanID From dbo.tblFactConsolidation FC Join dbo.tblFactConsolidationLoan FCL on FCL.DimPoolID = FC.DimPoolID And FCL.DimConsolidationID = FC.DimConsolidationID And FCL.LTVPassNo = FC.LTVPassNo Join dbo.tblFactLoan FL on FL.DimPoolID = FCL.DimPoolID And FL.DimLoanID = FCL.DimLoanId Where FC.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId And FC.LTVPassNo = @ResultLTVPassNo And FL.DimTrustID > 0 )
--Select @TotalBalance = Sum(ISNULL(FC.ConsolidationBalance,0)) --From dbo.tblFactConsolidation FC --Where DimPoolID = @DimPoolId --And LTVPassNo = @ResultLTVPassNo
Select @TotalBalance = SUM(CurrentPrincipalBalance) From dbo.tblFactLoan fl Where fl.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId And fl.DimLoanID in ( Select Distinct FL.DimLoanID From dbo.tblFactConsolidationLoan FCL Join dbo.tblFactLoan FL on FL.DimPoolID = FCL.DimPoolID And FL.DimLoanID = FCL.DimLoanId Where FCL.LTVPassNo = @ResultLTVPassNo And FCL.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId )
Select @Seasoning = Sum(ISNULL(FL.CurrentPrincipalBalance * FL.Seasoning, 0)) / @TotalBalance From dbo.tblFactLoan FL Join dbo.tblFactConsolidationLoan FCL on FCL.DimPoolID = FL.DimPoolID And FCL.DimLoanId = FL.DimLoanID And FCL.LTVPassNo = @ResultLTVPassNo Where FL.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId
Select @ConsolidationLTV = SUM(FC.WeightedConsolidationLTV) / @TotalBalance From dbo.tblFactConsolidation FC Where LTVPassNo = @ResultLTVPassNo And FC.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId
Select @InvestmentPropertyFlag = SUM(FL.CurrentPrincipalBalance) / @TotalBalance From dbo.tblFactLoan FL Inner Join dbo.View_LoanMainSecurity LMS on FL.DimLoanID = LMS.DimLoanId And FL.DimPoolID = LMS.DimPoolID And LMS.LTVPassNo = @ResultLTVPassNo Inner JOin dbo.tblDimSecurity DS on DS.DimSecurityID = LMS.DimSecurityId And DS.DimPoolID = LMS.DimPoolID Where FL.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId And DS.InvestmentPropertyFlag = ''''Y''''
Select @ScurbbedFlag = SUM(FL.CurrentPrincipalBalance) / @TotalBalance From dbo.tblFactLoan FL Join dbo.tblFactConsolidationLoan FCL on FCL.DimPoolID = FL.DimPoolID And FCL.DimLoanId = FL.DimLoanID And FCL.LTVPassNo = @ResultLTVPassNo Join dbo.tblDimLoan DL on DL.DimLoanId = FL.DimLoanID And DL.DimPoolID = FL.DimPoolID Where FL.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId And ScrubbedFlag = ''''Y''''
Select @PaymentTypeCode = SUM(FL.CurrentPrincipalBalance) / @TotalBalance From dbo.tblFactLoan FL Join dbo.tblFactConsolidationLoan FCL on FCL.DimPoolID = FL.DimPoolID And FCL.DimLoanId = FL.DimLoanID And FCL.LTVPassNo = @ResultLTVPassNo Join dbo.tblDimLoan DL on DL.DimLoanId = FL.DimLoanID And DL.DimPoolID = FL.DimPoolID Where FL.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId And PaymentTypeCode = ''''I''''
---------------------------
delete dbo.tblUIDataAggregation where DimPoolID = @DimPoolId and LTVPassNo = @ResultLTVPassNo
--------------------------- insert into dbo.tblUIDataAggregation(DimPoolID,LTVPassNo,AggregationCategory,AggregationItem,Value,UnitOfMeasure,FormatString,IsEnabled) Values (@DimPoolId ,@ResultLTVPassNo, ''''Total'''', ''''LoanCount'''', @TotalLoanCount,''''Count'''','''''''',1 ) ,(@DimPoolId ,@ResultLTVPassNo, ''''Total'''', ''''CurrentPrincipalBalance'''', @TotalBalance,''''Dollar'''','''''''',1) ,(@DimPoolId ,@ResultLTVPassNo, ''''Total'''', ''''SoldLoanBalance'''', @SoldLoanBalance,''''Dollar'''','''''''',1) ,(@DimPoolId ,@ResultLTVPassNo, ''''Total'''', ''''SecurityCount'''', @TotalSecurityCount,''''Count'''','''''''',1) ,(@DimPoolId ,@ResultLTVPassNo, ''''Total'''', ''''SecurityValuation'''', @TotalValuation,''''Dollar'''','''''''',1) ,(@DimPoolId ,@ResultLTVPassNo, ''''WeightedAverage'''', ''''ConsolidationLTV'''', @ConsolidationLTV,''''Percent'''','''''''',1) ,(@DimPoolId ,@ResultLTVPassNo, ''''WeightedAverage'''', ''''Seasoning'''', @Seasoning,''''Months'''','''''''',1) ,(@DimPoolId ,@ResultLTVPassNo, ''''DL.PaymentTypeCode'''', ''''I'''', @PaymentTypeCode,''''Percent'''','''''''',1) ,(@DimPoolId ,@ResultLTVPassNo, ''''DS.InvestmentPropertyFlag'''', ''''Y'''', @InvestmentPropertyFlag,''''Percent'''','''''''',1) ,(@DimPoolId ,@ResultLTVPassNo, ''''DL.ScrubbedFlag'''', ''''Y'''', @ScurbbedFlag,''''Percent'''','''''''',1)
insert into dbo.tblUIDataAggregation(DimPoolID,LTVPassNo,AggregationCategory,AggregationItem,Value,UnitOfMeasure,FormatString,IsEnabled) Select @DimPoolId ,@ResultLTVPassNo, ''''DS.State'''', DS.State, SUM(FL.CurrentPrincipalBalance)/@TotalBalance,''''Percent'''','''''''',1 From dbo.tblFactLoan FL Join dbo.View_LoanMainSecurity LMS on FL.DimLoanID = LMS.DimLoanId And FL.DimPoolID = LMS.DimPoolID And LMS.LTVPassNo = @ResultLTVPassNo And FL.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId Join dbo.tblDimSecurity DS on DS.DimSecurityID = LMS.DimSecurityId and DS.DimPoolID = LMS.DimPoolID Group By DS.State
insert into dbo.tblUIDataAggregation(DimPoolID,LTVPassNo,AggregationCategory,AggregationItem,Value,UnitOfMeasure,FormatString,IsEnabled) Select @DimPoolId ,@ResultLTVPassNo, ''''DS.Region'''', DS.Region, SUM(FL.CurrentPrincipalBalance)/@TotalBalance,''''Percent'''','''''''',1 From dbo.tblFactLoan FL Join dbo.View_LoanMainSecurity LMS on FL.DimLoanID = LMS.DimLoanId And FL.DimPoolID = LMS.DimPoolID And LMS.LTVPassNo = @ResultLTVPassNo And FL.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId Join dbo.tblDimSecurity DS on DS.DimSecurityID = LMS.DimSecurityId and DS.DimPoolID = LMS.DimPoolID Group By DS.Region
insert into dbo.tblUIDataAggregation(DimPoolID,LTVPassNo,AggregationCategory,AggregationItem,Value,UnitOfMeasure,FormatString,IsEnabled) Select @DimPoolId ,@ResultLTVPassNo , ''''DS.MetropolitanFlag'''' , MetropolitanFlag , SUM(FL.CurrentPrincipalBalance)/@TotalBalance , ''''Percent'''' , '''''''' , 1 From dbo.tblFactLoan FL Join dbo.View_LoanMainSecurity LMS on FL.DimLoanID = LMS.DimLoanId And FL.DimPoolID = LMS.DimPoolID And LMS.LTVPassNo = @ResultLTVPassNo And FL.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId Join dbo.tblDimSecurity DS on DS.DimSecurityID = LMS.DimSecurityId and DS.DimPoolID = LMS.DimPoolID Group By DS.MetropolitanFlag '
SET @BigSQL = 'USE [' + @DBName + ']; EXEC sp_executesql N''' + @vchSQL + ''''; EXEC (@BigSQL)
